CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: MOT picks up CHI and puts her on her lap
MOT sits on chair with CHI on lap
CHI gives MOT teddy and sits on floor to pick up the ball
MOT puts the teddy bear on a chair across the room
CHI walks to teddy and pats him gently
CHI walks across floor engrossed in the football she is holding
MOT leans forward and points to the jack+in+the+box
CHI picks up duck and shows MOT
CHI looks up at MOT briefly and smiles
CHI watches MOT and reaches for the jack+in+the+box
MOT moves CHI's hand out of the way and continues to wind the jack+in+the+box
MOT turns the jack+in+the+box to face CHI
CHI reaches out hand to open jack
MOT touches handle to show CHI where to wind toy
CHI touches handle and MOT helps her wind up toy
CHI stares at jack+in+the+box which popped out
CHI puts clown back in the box and tries to wind up the jack+in+the+box alone
MOT puts clown back in and closes cover for CHI
MOT moves from floor back up to sit in chair
<bef> CHI picks up the toy duck and plays with it
CHI looks at football then at MOT then back at jack+in+the+box
<aft> CHI puts duck down on floor and tries to push jack+in+the+box back down
MOT gets down on floor and helps CHI put clown back in box
CHI turns the handle with difficulty

g.ga: the way to turn the jack+in+the+box

u.a: <bef> MOT steadies the box and help CHI turn the handle
CHI holds onto the top of the jack+in+the+box
MOT moves CHI's hand off the lid of the jack+in+the+box
jack+in+the+box pops out . <aft> the jack+in+the+box pops out again
CHI tries to push the clown back in
MOT helps push clown in and close the cover
CHI looks at the jack+in+the+box and smiles
CHI slams the clown inside the jack+in+the+box
MOT helps CHI close the cover
CHI starts to wind up the jack+in+the+box again
MOT picks up the toy car on the floor
MOT turns the car over and looks at it closely
CHI looks up at MOT briefly
MOT rolls the car to CHI
CHI takes the car off of the floor
CHI holds the car and looks at the bottom of it
CHI spins wheel of car and rolls car on floor
CHI looks up at door and then points to door
<aft> CHI rolls the car on the floor
CHI rolls car along floor then lets it go
CHI tries to open lid of jack+in+the+box to make it come out
CHI smiles and looks up at MOT
CHI tries to turn the jack+in+the+box
MOT helps CHI wind up jack
MOT stops and removes CHI's hand that is on top of the jack+in+the+box
<aft> MOT leans back and watches CHI
MOT closes the cover of the jack+in+the+box
CHI looks at the book on the floor
<bef> MOT moves away the car and jack+in+the+box
CHI tries to open the book
MOT opens the book for CHI
MOT points to the picture in the book
INV explains Small Scale Activity to MOT and leaves while Small Scale Activity takes place . INV re-enters at 09:33:00
INV gives MOT directions for Forbidden Object Task to MOT and has her sit next to CHI at table . INV gives CHI a bead necklace to hold . INV clears the toys from Small Scale Activity off the table
INV puts the object on the table
CHI starts to put the object in her mouth and then removes it
CHI looks at the object intently
INV sets the object in motion
CHI stares at the object and puts her hand in her mouth
CHI chews her fingers and stares at the object
CHI watches the INV touching the Object
CHI watches the balls move on the Object
INV tells MOT about Parent Child Interaction Boxes . INV picks up the toys from Small Scale Activity . CHI remains seated in the large chair
MOT stands up and moves her chair against the back wall
MOT picks up the teddy bear and puts it on the chair
MOT takes the box off of the desk and takes CHI out of the chair so that she is standing facing MOT
MOT picks ball up and holds it so that CHI can see it
CHI grabs the ball from MOT
CHI looks down into the box
CHI who puts the ball in the box
<aft> CHI walks over to the chair
<bef> MOT takes the ball out of the box
MOT throws ball in air and rolls ball onto chair seat
CHI pushes ball off seat and then climbs onto chair seat
<aft> MOT bounces the ball on the floor
CHI gets up and sits on stool
CHI wraps both her arms around the ball protectively
CHI drops the ball on the floor
MOT holds the ball out to CHI
CHI looks at the stool she sits on
CHI hands the ball to MOT
CHI runs and gives MOT a hug
CHI grabs ball and rolls off MOT's lap to the floor with it
MOT picks up the ball and puts it in the box
CHI gets up off the floor
MOT gets up and returns box to table while CHI watches
MOT takes the next box off of the desk and opens it
MOT opens box and takes out the cloth
<bef> MOT puts cloth over her head
CHI looks at MOT while swinging her arms and the looks under the cloth
<aft> CHI pulls cloth off MOT head
MOT looks surprised when CHI pulls away cloth
CHI holds cloth up to MOT's face
CHI takes a few steps back
<bef> MOT throws cloth over CHI head
<bef> MOT lifts edge of cloth while it is still on CHI's head
CHI comes rushing at MOT with the cloth on her head
MOT wrestles with CHI while CHI is under cloth
CHI hits MOt playfully with cloth
<1-3> MOT takes teddy bear off the stool and covers him with the cloth
MOT holds teddy bear up for CHI to see
CHI scratches head and seems puzzled while watching the bear
CHI looks on unsure and then hugs the teddy bear
MOT hugs CHI and rolls her on the floor
CHI gets up and pushes the teddy bear aside
CHI looks down at the cloth on the floor
MOT puts the teddy bear on the stool
MOT picks up cloth and covers her head with it
CHI pulls the cloth off of MOT's head
CHI lays out the cloth on the floor and kicks the dustbin by accident . CHI turns around to look at the dustbin
CHI lies down on the cloth
CHI lays down on the cloth again
MOT pats CHI on the behind
CHI moves closer to MOT and touches her head on MOT knee
<bef> MOT takes CHI head into her hands
CHI stretches out hand to MOT who helps her get up
MOT spreads out cloth in front of the CHI
CHI sits down on the stool and looks at the cloth
MOT looks at CHI and waits
CHI runs over to the chair and picks up her teddy bear
MOT is out of camera view
CHI watches MOT and goes over to her
MOT opens box and spreads paper on floor
CHI takes two crayons out of the box
CHI picks up crayons and looks at paper
<aft> CHI leans over to the paper outside of the box and scribbles on it
CHI puts her other hand inside the box to steady herself
CHI drops the crayons into the box
CHI picks up the box and tips out its contents
CHI put the box on the floor behind her
CHI looks down at the paper and then smiles and looks up at MOT
MOT makes strange noise with her mouth
End of PCI - Crayons and Paper
CHI pushes the papers all around the floor
CHI throws her head back as she laughs
CHI gets up and runs around
MOT sits and looks at paper
CHI stops by chair and examines it
CHI climbs onto chair near table
CHI makes herself comfortable in the chair
MOT comes over to the table with the box
CHI examines chair and tries to tie herself in
MOT turns and helps CHI strap herself into the chair
MOT moves CHI back and ties her in
MOT brings the straps through the belt
MOT brings chair to table where she has the paper and crayons on the table
CHI tries to get out of the chair
<bef> MOT moves the chair back . MOT undoes the strap
CHI gets down from the chair
CHI tries to fasten the strap of the chair
CHI looks at the chair only
CHI continues to be engrossed manipulating seatbealt
CHI attempts to climb up on the chair
MOT pushes CHI up to the table
CHI steps over MOT kneeling on the floor and runs over to the stool
MOT begins to clear away the papers
CHI runs over to the stool and sits down on it
CHI runs over to MOT at the table
CHI lifts up one foot and looks at MOT
CHI continues to look at MOT with foot raised
<aft> MOT puts CHI's shoe back on
MOT goes out of camera view
CHI examines the chair she is sitting in
CHI gets down from the chair and walks over to MOT
MOT kneels on floor next to CHI and opens the book
CHI watches MOT open the book
CHI turns in the chair and looks at MOT
MOT taps the top of the stool
CHI gets down from the chair
MOT is about to sit on the stool
CHI stops MOT from sitting on the stool
MOT continues to kneel on the floor and hold the book
CHI pats the seat of the chair and looks at MOT
CHI starts to get in chair
CHI starts to climb up on the chair
MOT puts the teddy bear on the stool and pulls over the chair on which the teddy was sitting
MOT is about to sit on the chair
CHI moves over to the chair and puts her hands on it preventing MOT from sitting on it
CHI pats the large chair and looks at MOT
CHI pats the top of the stool indicating that MOT should sit there
MOT again gets up and sits in the chair
CHI climbs up on the large chair
CHI climbs onto chair as MOT prepares to read from the book
MOT opens book out on the table and points to a picture
CHI takes the book from MOT
<bef> CHI emits a high pitched whine
CHI moves the book in front of her
MOT points to the same picture
CHI points to the donkey in the book
MOT points to picture while CHI starts turning many pages of the book
CHI points to a picture and then abruptly turns the page
MOT turns the pages of the book the right way
CHI turns the page back reading the book backwards
CHI flips the pages of the book backwards
CHI tries to turn the page but it's the last page and so she turns it back the other way
CHI points to picture and then turns the page
CHI points to the same picture on page
CHI stands next to the chair and holds onto its arms
CHI climbs back onto same chair
CHI looks at the book on the table
MOT begins to turn pages in the book
CHI slams hand down on picture and points
CHI quickly turns page and points to another picture
CHI looks up at MOT waiting for response
CHI lifts up the next page without turning it
CHI points up to something on the wall
CHI leans and pushes chair backwards
CHI looks up at the door and points
INV enters the room End of PCI - Book .
